<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/nhi/inactivity/detect"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns entities that have exceeded their configured inactivity threshold
but do not yet have a grace period set.

  parameters={undefined}
